mapper.select: SELECT ts.sto_seq , ts.lto_seq , ts.sto_sort_order , td.domain_name , tl.lto_name , ts.sto_name , ts.sto_contents , ts.sto_trial_cnt , ts.sto_arr_std_pst , ts.sto_urg_contents , ts.sto_rnfc_contents , ts.sto_memo_contents , ts.sto_status_cd , ts.sto_reg_dt , ts.sto_status_ch_dt , ts.sto_tmp_seq FROM TB_STO ts LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LTO tl ON ts.lto_seq = tl.lto_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DOMAIN td ON tl.domain_seq = td.domain_seq WHERE ( ts.sto_status_cd = 'ING' OR (DATE_FORMAT(ts.sto_status_ch_dt, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND ts.sto_status_cd = 'CMP')) AND td.children_seq = #{childrenSeq } ORDER BY td.domain_sort_order, tl.lto_sort_order , ts.sto_sort_order

SELECT point_seq , sto_seq , point_rpn_cd , point_reg_mmr_seq , point_reg_dt FROM TB_STO_POINT WHERE sto_seq = #{stoSeq } AND point_round = (SELECT sto_round FROM TB_STO WHERE sto_seq = #{stoSeq }) ORDER BY point_seq
INSERT INTO TB_STO_POINT ( sto_seq, point_rpn_cd, point_reg_mmr_seq, point_reg_dt, point_round ) VALUES( #{stoSeq }, #{pointRpnCd }, #{pointRegMmrSeq }, current_timestamp(), #{pointRound } )
DELETE FROM TB_STO_POINT WHERE sto_seq = #{stoSeq } ORDER BY point_seq DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ts.sto_seq FROM TB_STO ts LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STO_POINT tsp ON ts.sto_seq = tsp.sto_seq WHERE ts.lto_seq = (SELECT lto_seq FROM TB_STO WHERE sto_seq = #{stoSeq }) GROUP BY ts.sto_seq ORDER BY MAX(tsp.point_reg_dt)

SELECT ts.sto_seq , ts.sto_name , ts.sto_status_cd , tsp.point_dt , ts.sto_trial_cnt , ts.sto_arr_std_pst , ROUND(tsp.rea_cnt / ts.sto_trial_cnt * 100, 0) AS rea_ratio , ROUND(tsp.urg_cnt / ts.sto_trial_cnt * 100, 0) AS urg_ratio , tsp.rea_cnt , tsp.urg_cnt , tsp.fai_cnt , (SELECT point_reg_mmr_seq FROM TB_STO_POINT WHERE point_seq = last_point_seq) AS point_reg_mmr_seq , (SELECT member_name FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE member_seq = (SELECT point_reg_mmr_seq FROM TB_STO_POINT WHERE point_seq = last_point_seq)) AS member_name FROM TB_STO ts INNER JOIN ( SELECT sto_seq , point_round , DATE_FORMAT(MAX(point_reg_dt), '%Y-%m-%d') AS point_dt , SUM(CASE WHEN point_rpn_cd='+' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS rea_cnt , SUM(CASE WHEN point_rpn_cd='P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS urg_cnt , SUM(CASE WHEN point_rpn_cd='-' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fai_cnt , MAX(point_seq) AS last_point_seq FROM TB_STO_POINT GROUP BY sto_seq, point_round ) tsp ON ts.sto_seq = tsp.sto_seq AND (tsp.rea_cnt + tsp.urg_cnt + tsp.fai_cnt) = ts.sto_trial_cnt WHERE ts.lto_seq = (SELECT lto_seq FROM TB_STO WHERE sto_seq = #{stoSeq }) ORDER BY ts.sto_sort_order, tsp.point_dt, tsp.point_round
